reviews.review_msg: Professor Mahmood is an amazing prof and was an absolute joy to learn from. The lectures were engaging and slides were always posted online. She's a fair grader and always willing to help out as long as you reach out. Course work was fun but time consuming and required you to fully understand course concepts. Would take her class again for sure!

This is the second class i have taken with this professor, so i knew what to expect. She does tend to just read off of slides which i don't find very helpful. However, if you pay attention, study and apply your knowledge, you should do well. The final project is heavily weighted and is a lot of work so be prepared (it's done in groups).

One of the best classes I've taken in a while- really enjoyed Atiya's teaching style in which she incorporated field-trips and interactive projects to help us better understand material. This course has a group project that requires a lot of time to do, but is super fun! Had no final this semester due to covid-19 so can't speak to that.
Interesting topic, but this professor lacks enthusiasm and teaching ability.
Not always clear but the course material is interesting.
